title: RHI monthly deployment data: [Month Year] (Annual edition)
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
description:
This statistical series provides deployment data for:
the non-domestic Renewable Heat Incentive (RHI) introduced in Great Britain in November 2011 to support the uptake of renewable heat in the non-domestic sector,
the domestic RHI introduced in Great Britain in April 2014 to encourage a switch to renewable heating systems in the domestic sector.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll to heading "Monthly deployment data" and click on latest annual edition. On new page dataset can be found under heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: Multiple tabs, dimensions and footnotes. Some messy tables. CSV only in zip and multiple small files within zip.
notes: Includes CSV but look messy. Requires investigation as to whether to use CSV or XLS format for transformation.
